intro.description: Specialized in web development, I love creating innovative solutions both in front-end and back-end. Always looking for new challenges that allow me to grow professionally.

paragraph.first: Hello, I'm Carlos G贸mez L贸pez.

paragraph.third: I started to be interested in computer science since I was young and thanks to what the career has taught me, it has generated that I have more interest and desire to learn new knowledge and specialize in others. In my last years I have specialized in front, although simply as entertainment, since I do well both in front-end and back-end.
paragraph.fourth: In addition, throughout the career I have been able to learn knowledge regarding cybersecurity, graph analysis, use of efficient algorithms, integration of conversational agents, etc.
paragraph.fifth: In my free time I like to acquire new knowledge for my own benefit, go out with friends and do sports.

cta.paragraph: If you have an idea, a project or just want to connect, I'll be happy to hear from you.
